New Records: Jayson Tatum recorded 33 points, nine assists, and eight rebounds, potentially setting a new career high or significant milestone
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum's free throws and three-pointers shifted momentum in the second quarter, leading to a 16-6 run for the Celtics
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics, with an 8-6 December record, used this win to start a four-game road trip in 2025; The Timberwolves were coming off a loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics won despite being short-handed, highlighting their resilience; Anthony Edwards' missed three-pointer prevented the Timberwolves from forcing overtime
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics committed only four turnovers, while the Timberwolves turned it over 16 times, showcasing Boston's defensive efficiency
